title: Buster Keaton | The Villain Still Pursued Her (1940) directed by Edward F. Cline | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Buster Keaton | The Villain Still Pursued Her (1940) directed by Edward F. Cline | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
You'll hate every hair of his mustache... as this pearl of innocence is trapped by the most dastardly villain that ever leered a leer! 

After learning of Mr. Middleton's passing and facing foreclosure, widow Wilson and daughter Mary are visited by Middleton's lawyer, Cribbs, who deceives them about Middleton's son's intentions. Mary, in an attempt to save her home, discovers Cribbs' deceit, but when she and Edward become engaged, Cribbs devises a scheme to ruin Edward's reputation, threatening their future happiness.

Original title: The Villain Still Pursued Her (1940)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/CfgvbK5x8J8
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Edward F. Cline
Writers: Elbert Franklin, Ethel La Blanche
Stars: Buster Keaton, Anita Louise, Hugh Herbert, Alan Mowbray, Richard Cromwell
Genres: Colorized classics, Comedy
